data.name: Title.Tools
data.comment: Page title for the Tools tab

data.name: Subtitle.Tools
data.value: Manage and use tool plugins to extend GenHub functionality
data.comment: Page subtitle for the Tools tab

data.name: Label.InstalledTools
data.comment: Section label for installed tools list

data.name: Label.Name
data.comment: Field label for tool name

data.name: Label.Version
data.comment: Field label for tool version

data.name: Label.Author
data.comment: Field label for tool author

data.name: Label.Description
data.comment: Field label for tool description

data.name: Label.ToolId
data.comment: Field label for tool identifier

data.name: Button.AddTool
data.comment: Button to add a new tool plugin

data.name: Button.RefreshTools
data.comment: Button to refresh the tools list

data.name: Button.CloseDialog
data.comment: Button to close a dialog

data.name: MenuItem.ViewDetails
data.comment: Context menu item to view tool details

data.name: MenuItem.RemoveTool
data.comment: Context menu item to remove a tool

data.name: Dialog.ToolDetails
data.comment: Dialog title for viewing tool details

data.name: Dialog.SelectToolAssembly
data.comment: File picker dialog title

data.name: FileType.ToolPluginAssembly
data.comment: File type description for DLL files

data.name: Status.Loading
data.comment: Loading status message

data.name: Status.NoToolsInstalled
data.value: No tools installed. Click 'Add Tool' to install a tool plugin.
data.comment: Status when no tools are installed

data.name: Status.InstallingTool
data.comment: Status during tool installation

data.name: Status.ToolInstalledSuccess
data.comment: Success message after installing a tool. {0} = tool name, {1} = version

data.name: Status.RemovingTool
data.comment: Status during tool removal. {0} = tool name

data.name: Status.ToolRemovedSuccess
data.comment: Success message after removing a tool. {0} = tool name

data.name: Status.RefreshingTools
data.comment: Status during tools refresh

data.name: Status.ToolsRefreshedSuccess
data.comment: Success message after refreshing tools. {0} = tool count

data.name: EmptyState.NoTools
data.comment: Empty state title when no tools are installed

data.name: EmptyState.NoToolsDescription
data.value: Click 'Add Tool' to install your first tool plugin
data.comment: Empty state description when no tools are installed

data.name: EmptyState.SelectTool
data.value: Select a tool from the list
data.comment: Prompt to select a tool from the sidebar

data.name: Tooltip.ExpandSidebar
data.comment: Tooltip for expand sidebar button

data.name: Tooltip.CollapseSidebar
data.comment: Tooltip for collapse sidebar button

data.name: Error.FailedToInstallTool
data.comment: Error message when tool installation fails. {0} = error details

data.name: Error.FailedToRemoveTool
data.comment: Error message when tool removal fails. {0} = error details

data.name: Error.FailedToRefreshTools
data.comment: Error message when tools refresh fails. {0} = error details

data.name: Error.FailedToLoadTools
data.comment: Error message when loading tools fails. {0} = error details

data.name: Error.ErrorLoadingTool
data.comment: Error message when a specific tool fails to load. {0} = tool name, {1} = error
